title: Maintenance Alert
message: The system will undergo maintenance on July 28th from 1AM to 3AM.

title: New Feature Released
message: Dark mode is now available under user settings.

title: Team Meeting Reminder
message: Quarterly team meeting scheduled for Friday at 10 AM in Conference Room B.

title: Bug Fixes Deployed
message: Issues with the notification bell and user avatars have been fixed.

title: Security Notice
message: Please reset your password as part of our annual security audit.

title: Office Closed
message: The office will be closed next Monday for a public holiday.

title: New Joiner Announcement
message: Please welcome Sarah to the marketing team!

title: System Performance Improved
message: We've optimized dashboard loading times by 35%.

title: Weekly Report Due
message: Submit your team reports by Thursday EOD.

title: New Poll: Team Retreat
message: Vote for your preferred retreat location by Friday.

title: Lunch & Learn Session
message: Join us this Wednesday for a talk on UX Design trends.

title: Quarterly Feedback Open
message: Feedback portal is now open. Please submit before July 31st.

title: Downtime Averted
message: Early detection helped avoid a major crash. Kudos to the devops team!

title: Updated Code of Conduct
message: Please review the updated company policies on internal communication.

title: New Integration: Google Drive
message: You can now link your Google Drive files directly in resources.
